hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: ${12 68 31}Don't forget to stand up and stretch regularly.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# is on the way of the hero.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #an Ocarina#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: If Gorons eat rocks, does that mean I'm in danger?

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Fountain# is a foolish choice.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the way of the hero.
